title: Support Login failed?
body: hey there, just wondering if anyone else has had this problem or I'm just missing something, trying to make a ticket to kindly ask Riot if they could add alistar / garen to my account since I'm having trouble on their twitter acct when trying to receive the code its not allowing it, also I subbed to the youtube site but cannot find any code to put in, when I try to make a ticket for them I enter acct details and it just says you have been signed out over and over not letting me put a ticket forward. Thanks in advance for any help

replies.body:
There appears to be something up at the moment, you shouldn't actually have to login to submit a ticket, but this issue you're having is very strange. I'll have a look around a bit and see if I can't find out why you have to login in the first place/why you'd be having this issue.

As far as the skins go, I gather the twitter code isn't always reliable so support can get it to you, and to get the Ali skin for OCE we've always had to submit a ticket. So once we can actually get a ticket out for you you should get that resolved pretty quick.
